holidays.description: Call in with a song request.

holidays.title: Poet's Day
holidays.description: Haikus are easy. Write one for a friend today. You are a poet.

holidays.title: Southern Hemisphere Hoodie Hoo Day

holidays.title: Buttered Corn Day
holidays.description: Well butter my grits. Grits are corn, ya know.

holidays.title: Pluto Demoted Day
holidays.description: Tell a youngster about how Pluto used to be a planet back in your day.

holidays.title: Ntl. Second-hand Wardrobe Day

holidays.title: Women’s Equality Day
holidays.description: Who runs the world? Girls.

holidays.title: Kiss Me Day
holidays.description: But only if you're feeling it.

holidays.title: Red Wine Day
holidays.description: There is truth in wine.

holidays.title: Lemon Juice Day

holidays.title: Frankenstein Day

holidays.title: Eat Outside Day

holidays.title: Intl. Bacon Day

holidays.title: World Coconut Day

holidays.title: Google Commemoration Day
holidays.description: Google it.

holidays.title: World First Aid Day
holidays.description: I need 20cc's of Band-Aids STAT!

holidays.title: Ntl. Grandparents Day
holidays.description: Thank your grandparents for letting you do everything your parents never let you.

holidays.title: Sewing Machine Day

holidays.title: 9/11 Remembrance
holidays.description: Never forget.

holidays.title: Emmy Day (Emmy Awards)

holidays.title: Citizenship Day

holidays.title: Intl. Talk Like a Pirate Day

holidays.title: Ntl. Pepperoni Pizza Day
holidays.description: Make pepperoni your pepperonly today.

holidays.title: Intl. Peace Day

holidays.title: Elephant Appreciation Day

holidays.title: Checkers Day

holidays.title: Intl. Girls Day
